lb:
During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 2.
Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.

During Day Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 3.
Increases aircraft reserves for all categories by 50 aircraft each.

During Day Battle, gains the ability to launch an [Airstrike] immediately that deals 50% damage. This attack will not incur any plane loss.
Cheerful upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name: Obliterate (木っ端微塵)
text:
If [Dive Bombing] sinks a a target, 100% chance for the target to explode after 1 second, dealing 150% of Saratoga's Firepower in damage to all enemies.
Can only proc once per battle.

skills.name: Supressive Shelling (制圧砲撃)
text: During [Battle], the first time Saratoga enters within Long Range, 100% chance to activate [Carrier Salvo] on enemy Flagship, dealing 400% of Saratoga's Firepower in damage.

skills.name: Night Dancer (夜空の舞姫)
text:
When entering a [Night Battle], Saratoga obtains a special [Airstrike] that deals 100% damage. 
If not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected.

Grants the ability to use [Opening Airstrike] during [Night Battle] if [Opening Airstrike] is unlocked.

comment: The White Devil. Is supportive of her sister Lexington's aggressive advances on the Commander. Likes crowded places. Always creates "frightening" new recipes using her cooking sense and sudden inspiration.
